p: Limiting factors analysis indicates that the main climate variables influencing the model prediction for the change in climate suitability are temperature seasonality (TS), min temperature of coldest month (MTCM), mean temperature of driest quarter (MTDQ), annual precipitation (AP) and precipitation of driest month (PDM) ( Figs. 4A– 4C, Table 3, Fig. S4). The changes in the five variables set them within or outside the range of the physiological tolerances of P. amabilis ( Fig. S5) and result in distribution expansion or contraction.
